body_html: @mcarilli I use ls -l |grep "^d"|wc -l to get the number of folders. I think mismatch may not be the reason, because when I use num_workers=0 on the full version of vggface2 dataset which uses both train and test set to train the model, It's working ok.
body_text: @mcarilli I use ls -l |grep "^d"|wc -l to get the number of folders. I think mismatch may not be the reason, because when I use num_workers=0 on the full version of vggface2 dataset which uses both train and test set to train the model, It's working ok.
body: @mcarilli I use `ls -l |grep "^d"|wc -l` to get the number of folders. I think mismatch may not be the reason, because when I use `num_workers=0` on the full version of vggface2 dataset which uses both train and test set to train the model, It's working ok.
